st-button/color.description: Predefined color of the button, default: primary

st-button/kind.description: Kind of the button, used to make it more or less noticeable, default: filled

st-button/label.description: Text inside the button. You can also use the default slot if needed

st-button/disabled.description: Whether the component should have a disabled style and not emit clicks

st-button/click.description: Emitted when the button is clicked
